roleset.name: cf work, working (of something)
roleset.note: OPERATING-N NOTES: Roleset based on noun entry operation.01. Framed by Claire. (from operating.01-n)

roles.note: Other roles not seen in data, see entries for operate-v and operation for additional examples. (from operating.01-n)

example.name: with manner
example.text: The Czech dam can't be operated solely at peak periods.

example.name: with substrate
example.text: The IRS operates on a computer system designed in 1961.
example.arg: on a computer system designed in 1961

example.name: with locative
example.text: The classroom itself operated on the periphery of this awful system.
example.arg: on the periphery of this awful system

example.name: ergative
example.text: The Texas Oil& Gas division operates in the red.

example.name: ergative and role
example.text: The Tower family operates as a central hub in a network of computers

example.name: with arg2
example.text: He says that he had never operated the saw on a piece of material as small as those he was using at the time of the injury.
example.arg: on a piece of material as small as those he was using at the time of the injury

example.name: Arg0, Arg1
example.text: Marjorie's operation of the forklift was expert and efficient.
John's operation of the saw on a variety of hardwoods caused the bearings to explode.

example.name: Arg0, Arg2
example.text: In a related matter , Peter Black , president of consumer brand Minwax , was named group vice president for the household products operating group .

roleset.name: perform surgery
roleset.note: OPERATE-V NOTES: Frame based on data in clinical notes corpus. Framed by Anwen Mar 2011. (from operate.101-v)

example.name: Tissue as patient
example.text: Dr. Jean operated on the tumor.

example.name: Passive
example.text: Mr. Wexler-*1* was operated on *1*-trace by Dr. Jean.

example.name: Both args
example.text: Dr.Lopez's operation on the gunshot victim saved his life.

example.name: arg 1 as diseased body part
example.text: possible reoperation of left heart valve bioprostheses

roleset.name: able to (be) operate(d)
roleset.note: OPERABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Relation to operate.01. (from operable.01-j)

example.name: arg1, arg3
example.text: The memory arrangement 10 is operable as a cache memory in a first mode of operation
example.arg: in a first mode of operation

example.name: arg1, 4
example.text: PROFINET is operable on standard hardware, with performances, PROFINET features and standard Ethernet capabilities !!!
example.arg: with performances, PROFINET features and standard Ethernet capabilities

example.name: args1, 2
example.text: A further and/or alternative object of the present invention is to provide a mechanism for inhibiting or preventing container rotation in a bottling and/or capping machine which-1 [*-1] is operable on plastic bottles or containers.
